document.full_text: israeli air strikes and shelling killed nine palestinians in the gaza strip friday, with no end in sight to an israeli operation against hamas islamists in retaliation for a rocket attack on an israeli school bus.
document.title: israeli air strikes and shelling kill nine in gaza
lines_and_colors: israeli air strikes and shelling killed nine palestinians in the gaza strip friday, with no end in sight to an israeli operation against hamas islamists in retaliation for a rocket attack on an israeli school bus.
